snippet: The gap between extreme users and the rest of the population is widening, according to Arieso, a company that advises mobile operators.
abstract: Arieso reports the gap between extreme mobile phone users and the rest of the population is widening, with 1 percent of consumers generating half of all traffic; notes the top 10 percent of users are consuming 90 percent of wireless bandwidth; notes the top 3 percent generate 70 percent of traffic, compared with 40 percent in 2009.
lead_paragraph: The gap between extreme users and the rest of the population is widening, according to Arieso, a company that advises mobile operators.
